#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long lint;
#define maxm 100007
lint Tree[maxm+1];
lint maxmtemp;
lint n;
void update(lint idx, lint val)
{
    while(idx<=maxmtemp)
    {
        Tree[idx]+=val;
        idx+=(idx & -idx);
    }
}
lint query(lint idx)
{
    lint sum=0;
    while(idx>0)
    {
        sum+=Tree[idx];
        idx-=(idx & -idx);
    }
    return sum;
}
void read()
{
    int u;
    scanf("%lld %d", &n, &u);
    maxmtemp=n+20;
    while(u--)
    {
        lint i, j, k;
        scanf("%lld %lld %lld", &i, &j, &k);
        i++;
        j++;
        update(i, k);
        update(j+1, -k);
    }
}
void solve()
{
    int u;
    scanf("%d", &u);
    while(u--)
    {
        lint i;
        scanf("%lld", &i);
        i++;
        printf("%lld\n", query(i));
    }
    memset(Tree, 0, sizeof(Tree));
}
int main()
{
    int test;
    scanf("%d", &test);
    while(test--)
    {
        read();
        solve();
    }
}
